${ModID}:HyperpolarityPower.NAME: Hyperpolarity
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #yMagnetized card you play is played twice.
The next #b%d #yMagnetized cards you play are played twice.

${ModID}:InduceCurrentPower.NAME: Induce Current
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yMagnetize a card, deal #b%d damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:SuperconductancePower.NAME: Superconductance
DESCRIPTIONS: #yMagnetized cards deal #b%d more Attack damage and gain #b%d more Block.

${ModID}:WorldDynamoPower.NAME: World Dynamo
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn your entire hand is #yMagnetized, gain #b%d [E] .
